publicationStmt.p: For research purposes only. Do not republish or distribute images or transcriptions from this edition without the permission of the Literary Estate of Marianne Moore. All rights reserved by the Literary Estate of Marianne Moore. Please contact the MMDA Director to inquire about the permissions required for specific materials on the site, or for information about how to contact the Moore Estate.

bibl.note: This notebook file is for testing purposes only.

div.desc: Single recto page contained in single div@type="image".

lg.l: This line has 7 spaces before the next period . It also has six spaces before this next period .
This line contains unclear text that should have a gray background.
This line contains a deletion, which should be rendered as strikethrough.
This line contains an illegible deletion, which should be rendered as gray background and strikethrough.
This line contains a single illegible character: ; and five consecutive illegible characters: . For each illegible character an ⍰ symbol should be inserted.
This line contains bold, italic, superscript, subscript, and colored text using basic html color names such as blue and red. When pencil is used, the font color should be gray.
This line contains a standard noteThis is a standard editorial note. It should appear as a small superscript "n" that can be clicked to open a pop-up window displaying the content of the note.

This line contains a glossary noteThis is a glossary note, denoted by the @target value. It should appear as a small superscript "g" that can be clicked to open a pop-up window displaying the content of the note.
This line is verse and should have a green genre band.
This line is conv[ersation] and should have a turquoise genre band.
This line is read[ing], which is the default value for this notebook, so there should be no orange genre band.
This line is prose and should have a pink genre band.
This line contains both prose and conv[ersation] so it should have both pink and turquoise genre bands.
This line contains both prose and conv[ersation] so it should have both pink and turquoise genre bands.
This line contains both prose and conv[ersation] so it should have both pink and turquoise genre bands.
